text: that's a jinja issue. Arrays declared and set inside a loop cannot be accessed outside the loop.
what u need to do is declare a fake array in order to trigger the append

try something like this:

{% set  arrayMonth2 =  arrayMonth.append( row.month ) %}
this will cause the append function to fire as it's being bound to a variable inside the loop
oh sorry didn't realise you sorted it out in another thread
